messages.title: Carry On Smears
messages.content: The recent mix up on Carry on Smears to impure the First Minister about a statements made regarding the NHS and Private Healthcare, was the lowest politics I remember a political party wallowing in its own hypocrisy in.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackle tax avoidance through cooperation with Revenue Scotland and HMRC. Support principles for fair exemptions, deductions, and allowances. Calls for UK tax system simplification and supports the SNP's stance on stronger legal deterrents against tax dodging.

mentions.candidate: Martin Docherty tells it as it is

issues.governance: Criticizes the Labour Party for their actions in the past, implicitly highlighting governance issues under their control.

quotes.text: SNP: If you will forgive West Dunbartonshire and Scotland's demand it in full.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Hand delivered by SNP volunteers to locations including Bowling, Dumbarton, Renton, Bonhill, Jamestown, Alexandria, Balloch, Haldane, and Gartocharn.
